content.title: Intro
content.content:
1928
Preceded by
1928
1929
Year
1930
Followed by
1930

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1929.

content.title: January
content.content: 2 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to E.V. Gordon.

content.title: June
content.content:
18 - Priscilla Tolkien, J.R.R. Tolkien's only daughter, is born.
23 - Barbara Remington, cover artist on some American editions, is born.

content.title: July
content.content: ? - J.R.R. Tolkien makes a recording for the Linguaphone Conversational Course.

content.title: October
content.content: 10 - Bernard Mayes, the adapter and voice of Gandalf in The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series) and The Hobbit (1979 radio series), is born.

content.title: December
content.content:
7 - C.S. Lewis sent a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien informing tha have read The Gest of Beren and Lúthien.
26 - Father Christmas writes a letter to J.R.R. Tolkien's children.

? - Essays And Studies (vol. 14, 1929), including the essay 'Ancrene Wisse and Hali Meiðhad' by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.
? - Daphne Castell is born.
Years
1926 1927 1928 1929 1930 1931 1932
